Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: find

Arguments.Name: E
Arguments.Description: Interpret regular expressions followed by -regex and -iregex primaries as extended

Arguments.Name: H
Arguments.Description: Cause the file information and file type returned for each symbolic link specified to be those referenced by the link

Arguments.Name: L
Arguments.Description: Cause the file information and file type returned for each symbolic link to be those of the file referenced by the link

Arguments.Name: P
Arguments.Description: Cause the file information and file type returned for each symbolic link to be those for the link itself

Arguments.Name: X
Arguments.Description: Permit find to be safely used in conjunction with xargs

Arguments.Name: d
Arguments.Description: Cause find to perform a depth-first traversal

Arguments.Name: f
Arguments.Description: Specify a file hierarch for find to traverse

Arguments.Name: s
Arguments.Description: Cause find to traverse the file hierarchies in lexicographical order

Arguments.Name: x
Arguments.Description: Prevent find from descending into directories that have a device number different than that of the file from which the descent began
